name: Drax
text: Drax gets +1 ATK for each vengeance counter on him. Response: After the villain attacks Drax, place 1 vengeance counter here (to a maximum of 3). If you cannot, draw 1 card.

name: Drax
text: Forced Response: After you change to this form, remove all vengeance counters from Drax. Heal 2 damage from him for each vengeance counter removed this way.

flavor: "Bring harm to this one at your own peril!"
name: Mantis
text: Action: Exhaust Mantis and deal 1 damage to her → heal 3 damage from an identity.

flavor: "Hear me, Thanos! Titan or god, I shall yet obliterate you!" - Drax
name: "Fight Me, Coward!"
text: Hero Action: Ready your hero and draw 1 card. The villain attacks you.

flavor: "Pay close attention because I'm only going to say this once: walk away and you live." - Drax
name: Intimidation
text: Hero Action (thwart): Remove X threat from a scheme, where X is equal to your ATK.

name: Knife Leap
text: Reduce the cost to play this card by 1 for each vengeance counter on Draw. Hero Interrupt: When you make a basic attack, you get +5 ATK for that attack. That attack gains overkill and piercing.

flavor: "You are a fool to believe I'd fall to the likes of you!" - Gamora
name: Parry
text: Hero Interrupt (defense): When you would take any amount of damage, prevent X of that damage, where X is equal to double your ATK.

name: Payback
text: Hero Response (attack): After the villain attacks you, deal X damage to the villain, where X is equal to your ATK.

name: Drax's Knife
text:
Restricted (Max 2 restricted cards per player.)
 While in hero form, Drax gets +1 ATK.

name: Drax's Other Knife
text:
Restricted (Max 2 restricted cards per player.)
 While in hero form, Drax gains retaliate 1.

flavor: "I will have my revenge against Thanos!" - Drax
name: DWI Theet Mastery
text: Hero Response: After Drax makes a basic attack, draw 1 card.

name: Too Stubborn to Die
text: Hero Interrupt: When Drax would be defeated, instead set his hit point dial to 4, change him to alter-ego form, and remove this card from the game.

flavor: "You want to learn about pain? I'll teach you!"
name: Martyr
text: Response: After Martyr takes consequential damage from performing an attack, if that attack defeated an enemy, give her a tough status card.

name: Moondragon
text: Action: Exhaust and discard Moondragon → choose a minion. That minion attacks another enemy of your choice.

name: Deflection
text: Hero Interrupt: When an identity would take any amount of damage from an attack, prevent up to 5 of that damage. Discard cards from the top of your deck equal to the amount prevented this way.

flavor: "That'll teach you to underestimate me." - Star-Lord
name: Hard Knocks
text: Hero Action (attack): Deal 4 damage to an enemy. If that enemy is defeated by this attack, give your hero a tough status card.

name: Leading Blow
text: Hero Interrupt: When your hero makes a basic attack, discard the top card of the encounter deck → reduce your hero's ATK for that attack by the number of printed boost icons on that card. If that attack still deals damage, ready your hero.

name: Subdue
text: Hero Interrupt: When an enemy initates an attack, that enemy gets -3 ATK for that attack.

name: Gamora
text: Play only if your identity has the [[guardian]] trait. Hero Response: After Gamora attacks or thwarts, discard cards from the top of your deck until you discard an event, than add that card to your hand.

flavor: "You picked the wrong day, pal!." - Rocket Raccoon
name: "Bring It!"
text: Max 1 per phase. Hero Action: Draw 1 card for each minion engaged with you.

flavor: "Hey, don't be angry at me! I definitely warned you." - Rocket Raccoon
name: "Think Fast!"
text: Play only if your identity has the [[guardian]] trait. Hero Action: Take 1 damage. Confuse the villain.

name: Regroup
text: Interrupt: When an ally is defeated by an enemy attack, return it to its owner's hand instead of discarding it. Forced Interrupt: When the round ends, discard this card.
